title: Pu`uhonua O H≈çnaunau National Historical Park: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets       Pets are not permitted in the Royal Grounds or in the Pu'uhonua areas. Pets are permitted in the picnic area, on the 1871 and along coastal trails. Pets must be under their owner's control and restrained on a leash no longer than 6 feet in length at all times. Please pick up after your pets and properly dispose of any waste.
